customer.title: Thanks for updated customer information
customer.content: You can now close the page and log in to our online services

prospect.title: Thank you for your information
prospect.content: We will be in touch shortly

contactDetailsRequiredBanner.title: Contact details missing
contactDetailsRequiredBanner.content: Please fill in your contact details before proceeding

contactUsToChangeBanner.title: Get in touch to change
contactUsToChangeBanner.content: Get in touch with your personal contact if any of the information needs to be changed

errorBanner.title: An error occurred
errorBanner.description: Please try again later or contact Carnegie.

formsCreatingBanner.title: Form Creation in Progress
formsCreatingBanner.content: We are currently generating the necessary forms for you. Please stand by and complete the remaining forms below once they appear.

formIncompleteBanner.title: The form is missing valid information
formIncompleteBanner.content: Review your answers below and try again

formsNotDoneBanner.title: There is information left to submit
formsNotDoneBanner.content: Please complete the remaining forms below

formsNotLoadedBanner.title: Forms could not be loaded
formsNotLoadedBanner.content: Try reloading the page. Contact Carnegie if the problem persists.

userAutomaticallyLoggedOutBanner.title: You've been automatically signed out
userAutomaticallyLoggedOutBanner.content: Please sign in again to continue.
